tags: and now i’ve made myself emotional
summary: Question: in the At Storm's End universe, Lyanna loves picking flowers just like her mom did as a child? Does she gift them to...
question: Question: in the At Storm's End universe, Lyanna loves picking flowers just like her mom did as a child? Does she gift them to Gendry? (Do they have a garden she loves to destroy?). DOES SHE GIFT THEM TO UNCLE JON???!!!
answer:
Short answer: absolutely.

Long answer: She’s not the only one. Mycah, noted soft boi, used to pick flowers for his mummy and daddy all the time, and they would make an almost embarrassingly big deal over how much they loved their little bouquets.

Then he went through a few years where he was too old for it, but once his little sister showed an interest, he was all over it once again, and they go hand in hand to the flower patches (which are flourishing nicely) and he teaches her how to make flower crowns, and if you think any member of House Baratheon looks even slightly less terrifying wearing a flower crown, ding dong you are wrong.

Arya used to pick flowers for Jon when he was unhappy, so the first time Lyanna presents him with a slightly crushed bunch of daisies and tells him not to be sad, he is basically in tears and tells her it’s the best gift he’s ever gotten.

Arya used to pick flowers for Jon when he was unhappy, so the first time Lyanna presents him with a slightly crushed bunch of daisies and tells him not to be sad, he is basically in tears and tells her it’s the best gift he’s ever gotten.

Then he went through a few years where he was too old for it, but once his little sister showed an interest, he was all over it once again, and they go hand in hand to the flower patches (which are flourishing nicely) and he teaches her how to make flower crowns, and if you think any member of House Baratheon looks even slightly less terrifying wearing a flower crown, ding dong you are wrong.

tags: this isnt sansa hate unless you consider grrm a sansa hater since he made her an ableist classist bully who supports the status quo
summary: Until Sansa stans can admit that Sansa bullied Arya and contributed to her sister's low self-esteem, they can't call themselves...
body: Until Sansa stans can admit that Sansa bullied Arya and contributed to her sister’s low self-esteem, they can’t call themselves Arya fans. Hell, they can’t even call themselves Sansa fans since they deny that there’s any complexity in their self-insert. Oh, and they also can’t claim to have any comprehension skills either since Sansa’s bullying is canon and it was a significant part of the very reason GRRM created her. It’s not even subtle or at all disputable.

Oh, and they also can’t claim to have any comprehension skills either since Sansa’s bullying is canon and it was a significant part of the very reason GRRM created her. It’s not even subtle or at all disputable.

Oh, and they also can’t claim to have any comprehension skills either since Sansa’s bullying is canon and it was a significant part of the very reason GRRM created her. It’s not even subtle or at all disputable.

It’s not even subtle or at all disputable.

title: seven deadly sins
body:
Lust (Theon) - an intense desire, for money, power, or sex, appealing to the human’s basest instincts.

Wrath (Arya) - described as an inordinate and uncontrolled feelings of hatred and anger that often lead to violence.

Sloth (Bran) - the failure to utilize one’s talents and gifts, also defined as failing to do one’s duty.

Envy (Jon) - a sad or resentful covetousness towards the traits of someone else.

Greed (Sansa) -  an excessive or rapacious desire and pursuit of material possessions.

Gluttony (Rickon) - placing one’s own interests above the well-being or interests of others.

Pride (Robb) - an excessive belief in one’s own abilities, considered the worst of the sins and the source of the others.

source: Inferno by Dan Brown

summary: The night the bird had come from Winterfell, Eddard Stark had taken the girls to the castle godswood, an acre of elm and alder...
text: The night the bird had come from Winterfell, Eddard Stark had taken the girls to the castle godswood, an acre of elm and alder and black cottonwood overlooking the river. The heart tree there was a great oak, its ancient limbs overgrown with smokeberry vines; they knelt before it to offer their thanksgiving, as if it had been a weirwood. Sansa drifted to sleep as the moon rose, Arya several hours later, curling up in the grass under Ned’s cloak. All through the dark hours he kept his vigil alone. When dawn broke over the city, the dark red blooms of dragon’s breath surrounded the girls where they lay. “I dreamed of Bran,” Sansa had whispered to him. “I saw him smiling.”
source: George R R Martin, A Game of Thrones, Eddard V

reblog.comment: George R R Martin, A Game of Thrones, Eddard V

summary: Arya hated it. She hated the sounds of their voices now, the way they laughed, the stories they told. They’d been her friends,...
body:
Arya hated it. She hated the sounds of their voices now, the way they laughed, the stories they told. They’d been her friends, she’d felt safe around them, but now she knew that was a lie.

AGOT Arya II

“It was just a lie,” he said bitterly, remembering the crow from his dream. “I can’t fly. I can’t even run.”

AGOT Bran IV

Nice parallel between Arya and Bran: growing up is realizing that sometimes the world lies to you.

blog.description: I write fics about Gendrya. If you like lots of random Gendrya prompts and headcanons this is the tumblr for you.

summary: I wish there were more Gendrya fics where Arya is also close to Robb. I re-watched the archery scene from episode 1 yesterday...
body: I wish there were more Gendrya fics where Arya is also close to Robb. I re-watched the archery scene from episode 1 yesterday and my heart melted at Robb and Jon’s reaction to her shot. I know Jon is the brother everyone makes her super close with but I wish there were more fics that didn’t just pair her up with Jon or Jon and Sansa.

forever bitter that arya never spoke to lyanna mormont, not only because they should have been allowed to form a female friendship where another gnc girl is the one looking up to arya
